title: Skirt
description: tight accordian pleated skirt with wide (5-1/2\") black waistband with loops and ties; brown damask body with 5-3/4\" applied embroidery, lower border; border has five sections of alternating embroidery and ribbon tape in dark colors of red, black and white
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
